message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product for sale. I think you'll really appreciate its value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $16000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I understand you like the product, but $16000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to propose $18500. This is the best I can do, and I think it's still a great deal for you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider $17000?

I understand you're still a bit short on budget, but I'm not willing to go below $18000. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll meet you at $17500. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $17500, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $17000?
